EmailTemplate.subject: Be A Less Stressed Solopreneur
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-work-life-balance-as-a-solopreneur.aspx?cmp=EBBSAUGUSTBLOG19&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Could You Solopreneur Better?
Working solo often means doing everything yourself. Avoid burnout with these strategies that can help align living your life, with running a successful business. Learn More <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-work-life-balance-as-a-solopreneur.aspx?cmp=EBBSAUGUSTBLOG19&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
